summary:
A focused, dedicated, pro-active, ambitious and professional MBA graduate with 7 years experience in Strategic Sourcing. I've started working in the pharmaceutical industry, in different Sourcing positions, since I got my bachelor degree in pharmacy in 2007. 

During my working experience, I gained a lot of business knowledge and skills, and it was then when I found my passion for ideation, innovation and entrepreneurship. Hence, I started to come up with creative ideas, acting on them and starting new projects that helped in making the department more efficient and more effective and driving change within the organization. I also founded two start-ups along with some friends at the same time.

I strongly believe that passion, self motivation, accountability, attention to details, dedication and persistence are some of the characteristics that I have which can help in adding value to the work place and achieving great results. Moreover, I believe that if every person gives their best in whatever they do in an organization, then success will ultimately be the result that everyone will see. Furthermore, I am an eager learner who believes that every experience and every person we meet along our life journey, carries a lesson upon which we can reflect and eventually learn, grow and prosper.

“Leadership is less about the position you hold than the influence you have. It's about doing world-class work, playing at your peak, and leaving people better than you found them. It's about Leading Without a Title.” Robin Sharma

projects.title: Business Plan Challenge for a Global Dialogue on Emerging Technologies for Emerging Needs
projects.description:
The project was aimed to to help the Red Cross/Red Crescent strengthen urban disaster resilience through the use of emerging technologies.
Our team had to prepare a business plan for an assigned emerging technology use case (Smart Home sensor networks for sensing and reporting fires in informal settlements/slums). The requirement was to submit a written business plan and presentation materials (a 1-page Executive Summary, PowerPoint Presentation, and a poster) to the Netherlands Red Cross. Finally, we presented our business plan (pitch style) at a summit in January 2015, at the Nyenrode campus, for an audience of Red Cross/Red Crescent leaders and representatives from business, academia and government. During the summit, audience voted for four teams’ ideas to be prioritized for further consideration, and our idea was one of them.

profile_positions.description:
"Women to Watch" (www.women2watch.net), is a premier global media platform for women leaders. It is stand-alone multimedia platform to inspire and encourage women to purse leadership roles worldwide.
The platform includes a weekly radio show, a digital and print form, events and video production programs that tell the real story behind the titles of some of the most accomplished women in history. Attention is brought to successes, doubts, challenges and even failures faced by women trying to make it in their chosen career. 
The primary mission of the interviews is to connect, educate, and inspire women in order to strengthen their self-esteem, find their passion, and live a purposeful life.
profile_positions.title: International Content Contributor (Volunteer)

profile_positions.description: Global Thinkers Forum (GTF) is a global platform that brings together a diverse network of thought leaders to share their visions of the future, create meaningful conversations around them and effect positive change in the world. GTF’s mission focuses on three areas: accountable leadership, women’s empowerment and youth development. GTF is also a bridge-builder, creating opportunities for knowledge exchange, collaboration, strategic philanthropy and recognition. The Forum is non-profit, London-based and was incubated at Oxford University’s Said Business School in 2011. The Athena mentorship program which I'm part of aims to add value to the lives of young people and women above the age of 30 through their individual interaction with inspiring people, willing to guide them and advise them on issues of career and life. It is also about bridging the gap between the current and future leaders of the world. It is about bringing about positive change in the world by nurturing the next generation of leaders.
profile_positions.title: Mentee

profile_positions.description:
Book in Transit (BIT) is a simple project, initiated by a group of enthusiastic, ambitious, and goal oriented people who are trying to move a step forward towards changing the world, through connecting people, through sharing and through elevating one another. We believe that reading is growing, reading is empowering, so read, read on, share and keep the journey going.

Book In Transit (BIT) works as a social network for bookworms where people can share, discuss and review books with fellow members.
www.bookintransit.com

profile_positions.description:
Safarvia was started by individuals who love to travel and experience new and different cultures, as well as learn about the traditions and language of that country. Safarvia was started to enrich the educational and travel experiences of people.

We provide a path to learn languages abroad by offering a range of courses in different schools and in different cities. All schools were personally picked and visited by our team.We help individuals and groups pick the right course for them with different accommodation choices, making sure they get the option that suits them best.

volunteer_experiences.description: Nyenrode uses Alumni Peer Group Coaching (PGC) to build a group of supportive and bonded students and to familiarize them with, and strengthen their individual coaching skills. A group of 4-6 students from different nationalities come together, each one bringing something they find challenging during their study, career  or in personal life. Through the process of PGC, each student gains fresh ideas on their challenges, and the stimulation of considering what others are facing. In the process, a strong learning community and network is created.
